edu.jhu.cs.pl.group18.CurseOfMalphamondConnectionManager

Class Messenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.jhu.cs.pl.group18.CurseOfMalphamondConnectionManager.Messenger

  • public class Messenger
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a messenger implementation. The model proxy on the client side will use the object of this class to send message to the model Impl on the server side.
